name: BLINK PIANO - KPOP PINK TILES
description:
-WE ARE BLINK AND WE LOVE KPOP

- BLINK PIANO will challenge your reflexes and reaction time while you play piano covers of your favorite BLINK songs!

HOW TO PLAY
----------------------------------
The game is pretty simple and easy to play:
- tap the piano tiles to complete the song.
- Don’t tap the white tiles.
- every time you complete the song, it gets faster!
- the longer you resist, the greater your prizes are!

FEATURES
----------------------------------
- 7 different instruments!
- Online leaderboards to compete with other players.
- Lots of daily bonuses.
- Perfect for blinks!

BLINK PIANO! will create an extremely interesting experience for anyone who loves KPOP music.

All free! Play BLINK PIANO! today!
